item.title: 1 student killed, 2 hurt in stabbing outside their high school; suspects at large

item.title: Boy uses mom's phone to order 70,000 lollipops to share with friends
item.description: Holly LaFavers says she tried stopping 8-year-old Liam's Amazon order for about 70,000 Dum-Dum suckers before the treats arrived but it was too late.

item.title: More black smoke as cardinals resume voting on Day 2 of papal conclave
item.description: 2025 papal conclave continues for a second day at the Vatican, as more black smoke signals no new pope after a third vote.
